alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 17 at 8:44PM EDT until July 17 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MONROE...SOUTHWESTERN MORGAN AND NORTHEASTERN OWEN COUNTIES... At 844 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Martinsville, or 14 miles north of Bloomington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Monroe, southwestern Morgan and northeastern Owen Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
